local_intent: Approach and align to the T-block, then set yaw to 45 and verify orientation.
assumptions: Target block is detectable; start pose allows approach from above; yaw can be set to 45 degrees.
coherence_with_global: Matches global flow for this phase: detect block with retries, approach and align at 0.005 tolerance, set yaw to 45, then verify orientation before pushing.
